description: In Tanzania Jumeme, a mini-network operator, co-financed by the European Commission, is launching a "Covid-19 aid programme" to support the Tanzanian government. The programme will provide free electricity for three months to 10 health care centres on the islands of Lake Victoria in Tanzania. The electricity will come from the company's local mini-hybrid solar grids on April 30.
